comments.comment: All seems good except the length and size of sleeves is long and big in size 34

Everything about the suit is good from colour to material quality to comfort. The only slight issue I had is with the fit. For a slim fit suit, I would have preferred the waist size to be a bit shorter and tighter to my body. It looks a bit loose with what I got, not that it is starkly unpleasant but a shorter waist size would have been better.

I just got my first order and I have one word WOW!!!! Love, Love, Love these cloths!! I had my doubts before I ordered because most sites plus size cloths are too small and I'm usually disappointment, but not this time!! The shipping was also really fast1 only took about 9 days to get to me. Love it!! I'll be back to buy more. For Sure!
Super fit, cloth, ultra stylish. MUST MUST BUY...none of my friend/family could believe its price. Very reasonably priced
Very good product ..just go for it and all u need to do is a little fitting..
Zip broken and pant stitching not done at the end . Bad experience
This is a amazing suit given the price. The material is good and it suits well as a formal outfit. Pair it with a black shirt, that’s the best combination.
Good one and perfect fit also nice cloth quality and all are perfect not compromise with this price range.
